com.guardtime.ksi.publication

Interface PublicationsFile


  • public interface PublicationsFile

    KSI trust store provides trusted certificates and publications for verifying KSI signatures. It provides methods for getting trusted certificates for verifying authentication records and a list of publications for verifying calendar hash chains.

    See Also:
    PublicationsFile

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Certificate findCertificateById(byte[] certificateId)
      Finds and returns certificate form trust store by certificate ID.
      PublicationRecord getLatestPublication()
      This method is used to get the newest publication from publications file.
      String getName() 
      PublicationRecord getPublicationRecord(Date publicationTime)
      This method is used to get the "closest" publication after the input time.
      List<PublicationRecord> getPublicationRecords()
      Returns the list of the publications records in publications file.

    • Method Detail

      • findCertificateById

        Certificate findCertificateById(byte[] certificateId)
                         throws CertificateNotFoundException
        Finds and returns certificate form trust store by certificate ID.
        Parameters:
        certificateId - certificate id to search for
        Returns:
        certificate instance of Certificate
        Throws:
        CertificateNotFoundException - if certificate with given id wasn't found

      • getPublicationRecord

        PublicationRecord getPublicationRecord(Date publicationTime)
        This method is used to get the "closest" publication after the input time.
        Parameters:
        publicationTime - time to be used to find the closest publication
        Returns:
        instance of PublicationRecord if the closest publication exists. null otherwise.

      • getPublicationRecords

        List<PublicationRecord> getPublicationRecords()
        Returns the list of the publications records in publications file. If the publications file doesn't contain publications records then the empty list will be returned.

      • getLatestPublication

        PublicationRecord getLatestPublication()
                                throws KSIException
        This method is used to get the newest publication from publications file.
        Returns:
        returns the newest publications
        Throws:
        KSIException - when error occurs

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns:
        human readable description for this KSI Trust provider
